## FormActionsOptions interface

Represents different options for customizing behaviour of the form actions

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface FormActionsOptions<TForm> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [allowPristine?](./form-sheet.formactionsoptions.allowpristine.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Can the form submit in pristine state? |
|  [getRawValue?](./form-sheet.formactionsoptions.getrawvalue.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Set to true to get the raw form value on submit. This includes the values of disabled controls. |
|  [onlineRequired?](./form-sheet.formactionsoptions.onlinerequired.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Should the form require the user to be online before submitting? |
|  [resetState?](./form-sheet.formactionsoptions.resetstate.md) | Partial&lt;TForm&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The form value that will be set on reset |
|  [resettable?](./form-sheet.formactionsoptions.resettable.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Set to true if the form should have a reset option |
|  [submitText?](./form-sheet.formactionsoptions.submittext.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The text of the submit button |
